properties.description: Free Food/Drink, People to chat to, Wheelchair Accessible, Toilets, Child Friendly, We offer a warm, welcoming space, serving free coffee and biscuits. We provide board games and invite you to bring a book to read, some knitting or sewing, or your headphones to listen to music, or just come to chat.
